constituent: penetrate, Nelson, column, going, line, borstal, bring up, infant, toddler, top hat, elbow, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, taskmaster
koohiiStory1: The taskmistress in a moment of weakness allowed the man´s column to penetrate her. As punishment he was made to bring up their infant.
koohiiStory2: Ha! In this frame, a bunch of taskmasters are lined up to penetrate the kids they raise/bring up! I´m thinking of some priests and choir boys.
myStory: chữ triệt. thông suốt, bỏ, phá hủy. đi chậm giáo Dục và đuổi Truy sau.
words: to sink in, to penetrate, to devote oneself, to believe in, to go through, to do intently and exclusively
all night, all-night vigil, sleepless night
